problem2

Class Hands

  • java.lang.Object
    • problem2.Hands
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Hand

    public class Hands
extends java.lang.Object
implements Hand
    Defines the hands that participate in a game of cards. It can be implemented to different type of games such as euchre, pinochle, etc.
    Author:
    meghna
